data.actual_result: When going back to the screen with the overlay, the drag is still active and you can still move the overlay around.
data.expected_result: The drag will stop once you switch to your second monitor
data.short_description: [OVERLAY] Drag will be stuck if the mouse goes to a second screen/monitor
data.steps_to_repro: - Open your Discord Overlay on any game - Left Clic on any part of the overlay and drag it around - Drag your mouse to your second screen - Release your mouse clic on your second screen
